Pre-Game Insights: Didier Deschamps is facing an intriguing selection dilemma in the final third for Monday's Euro 2024 last-16 tie with Belgium.
Kylian Mbappe's spot kick preceded Robert Lewandowski's own penalty in the 1-1 draw with Poland on Tuesday.
Antoine Griezmann should almost certainly return after being benched in the final group game.
Marcus Thuram is reportedly set to start in tandem with Mbappe up front, with Griezmann operating just behind them.
Post-Match Reflections: The match ended 1-0 in favor of France with an 85th-minute own goal from Vertonghen.
Theo Hernandez, William Saliba, Dayot Upamecano, and Jules Kounde shielded Mike Maignan in the backline.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Merkur Spiel-Arena in Dusseldorf.
The match ended 1-0 in favor of France with an 85th-minute own goal from Vertonghen.
Others: France's possible starting lineup: Maignan; Kounde, Saliba, Upamecano, Hernandez; Kante, Tchouameni, Rabiot; Griezmann; Thuram, Mbappe
